scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/static && npm run copy && npm run critical
scripts.copy: npm run copy:static && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:css && npm run copy:vendor
scripts.critical: find dist -type f -name '*.html' -exec sh -c '$(npm bin)/critical {} --base dist --inline > dist/tmp.html && mv dist/tmp.html {}' \;
